'''1.0.27''', the first release of the '''[[Chemistry Update]]''', is a major update to [[Minecraft Education|''Minecraft Education'']], released for macOS on February 22, 2018, and for Windows on March 6, 2018.<ref>{{cite|url=https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360004167911|title=Education Edition: Chemistry Update (1.0.27)}}</ref><ref>https://education.minecraft.net/en-us/blog/introducing-chemistry-update-for-minecraft-education-edition</ref>
